product_name: The North Face Janey II Luxe Winter Boots - Women's
long_description: Around the mountain or in town, the Janey II Luxe winter boots by The North Face feature cozy PrimaLoft(R) Eco insulation and waterproof protection to keep you trucking all through winter. Luxurious waterproof suede leather uppers use a rear entry design; rawhide leather laces and medial zippers provide a personalized, secure fit. Full-grain leather randing on the Janey II Luxe winter boots helps protect uppers and feet. Linings are made of recycled PET polyester faux fur, supplying soft comfort and enhanced insulation. 200g PrimaLoft Eco polyester fiber insulation keeps feet cozy; uses a minimum of 50% recycled materials in combination with standard PrimaLoft fibers. Drop-in EVA midsoles supply cushioning and shock absorption for wear all day long. Thermoplastic urethane shanks provide stability and support and help reduce cold-temperature conductivity. TNF Winter Grip(TM) rubber outsoles supply tenacious traction in wet, slick conditions; omnidirectional lugs are both grippy and self-cleaning. Temperature-sensitive Ice Pick(TM) rubber lugs on outsoles harden when temps fall below freezing, providing extra bite into the terrain.
short_description: Around the mountain or in town, the Janey II Luxe winter boots by The North Face feature cozy PrimaLoft(R) Eco insulation and waterproof protection to keep you trucking all through winter.
